argument.name: Status
argument.description: The status of a shipment sent through United Parcel Service (UPS).

argument.name: tracking_num
argument.description: The tracking number of a shipment sent through United Parcel Service (UPS).

page.description: Contacts the UPS web site and looks up the status of the specified tracking number
page.discussion: The UPS_Delivery_Status() function contacts the UPS web site and looks up the status of a shipment sent through United Parcel Service (UPS). It then returns the status of the shipment sent via the United Parcel Service (UPS). Note : Use of this function requires an active Internet connection. See also, List Processing Functions.
